name: RRR
description: RRR is an upcoming Indian Telugu-language period action drama film directed by S. S. ... It is a fictional story about two Indian revolutionaries, Alluri Sitarama Raju (Charan) and Komaram Bheem (Rama Rao), who fought against the British Raj and Nizam of Hyderabad respectively.

name: Goodachari
description: Gopi is recruited into RAW, but on his graduation day, he is implicated in a plot to kill two RAW officials. Declared a wanted terrorist, Gopi fights to clear his name and find the people responsible.

name: Most eligible bachelor
description: A bachelor living in the U.S. returns to India determined to find a wife and falls for a stand-up comedian who appears uninterested in being romantically pursued.

name: Dear Comrade
description: Bobby, a student union leader with anger issues, falls in love with Lily, a state-level cricketer. However, his temperament poses an obstacle in his path to being united with Lily.

name: V
description: A mystery man named V sets out to exact revenge for his wife's brutal murder. However, he must evade a police officer, who is determined to catch him.
